trans-unit.source: Shader
Shader Language
Shader Variables
Shader effect.
Shader:getExternVariable
Shader:getWarnings
Shader:hasUniform
Shader:send
Shader:sendColor

Shaders are not programmed in Lua, but by using a special shader language – GLSL, with a few aliases and a different entry point for convenience – instead. GLSL has very similar syntax to C. None of the aliases LÖVE provides are mandatory, but using Texel instead of texture2D is recommended since Texel works in all glsl versions, whereas texture2D does not work in GLSL 3.
trans-unit.target: 着色器不是用Lua编程的，而是通过使用特殊的着色器语言GLSL（带有一些别名和方便使用的其他入口点）来代替的。GLSL的语法与C非常相似。LÖVE提供的别名都不是强制性的，但建议使用 Texel 而不是 texture2D ，因为 Texel 在所有glsl版本中均可使用，而 texture2D 在GLSL 3中不起作用。

trans-unit.source: Shaders are not programmed in Lua, but by using a special shader language instead. The shader language is basically GLSL 1.20 (specs) with a few aliases added for existing types:
trans-unit.target: 着色器不是用Lua编程的，而是通过使用特殊的着色器语言编写的。着色器语言基本上是GLSL 1.20（specs），并为现有类型添加了一些别名：

trans-unit.source: Shaders are small programs which are run on the graphics card when drawing. Vertex shaders are run once for each vertex (for example, an image has 4 vertices - one at each corner. A Mesh might have many more.) Pixel shaders are run once for each pixel on the screen which the drawn object touches. Pixel shader code is executed after all the object's vertices have been processed by the vertex shader.
trans-unit.target: 着色器是在绘制时在图形卡上运行的小程序。顶点着色器对每个顶点运行一次（例如，一个图像有4个顶点-每个角处一个顶点。网格可能包含更多个顶点。）像素着色器对绘制对象触摸的屏幕上的每个像素运行一次。顶点着色器处理完所有对象的顶点后，将执行像素着色器代码。

trans-unit.source: Shaders are small programs which are run on the video card when drawing. Vertex shaders are run once for each vertex (for example, an image has 4 vertices - one at each corner. A Mesh might have many more.) Pixel shaders are run once for each pixel on the screen which the drawn object touches. Pixel shader code is executed after all the object's vertices have been processed by the vertex shader.
trans-unit.target: 着色器是在绘图时在视频卡上运行的小程序。顶点着色器为每个顶点运行一次（例如，一个图像有4个顶点-每个角处一个顶点。网格可能包含更多个顶点。）像素着色器为绘制对象触摸的屏幕上的每个像素运行一次。顶点着色器处理完所有对象的顶点后，将执行像素着色器代码。

trans-unit.source: Since this function enqueues a screenshot capture rather than executing it immediately, it can be called from an input callback or love.update and it will still capture all of what's drawn to the screen in that frame.

trans-unit.source: The Texel shader function can be used to sample from all types of textures in a shader. Texel is recommended instead of texture2D, textureCube etc., because the latter do not work across all versions of GLSL supported by LÖVE, whereas Texel does (GLSL 3 removed texture2D and added a generic texture function).
trans-unit.target: 的 Texel 着色器函数可以从所有类型的着色器纹理被用于样品。建议使用 Texel 而不是 texture2D ， textureCube 等，因为后者不适用于LÖVE支持的所有GLSL版本，而Texel可以（GLSL 3删除了 texture2D 并添加了通用 texture 功能）。

trans-unit.source: The clampzero mode is not available on most mobile devices, and will fall back to the clamp mode when it's unsupported. Check the clampzeroGraphicsFeature constant by calling love.graphics.getSupported.
trans-unit.target: 该 clampzero 模式是不适用于大多数移动设备，并且将回落到 clamp 模式时，它是不支持的。通过调用love.graphics.getSupported检查 clampzero GraphicsFeature常量。

trans-unit.source: The highdpi window flag must be enabled to use the full pixel density of a Retina screen on Mac OS X and iOS. The flag currently does nothing on Windows and Linux, and on Android it is effectively always enabled.
trans-unit.target: 该 highdpi 窗口标志必须能够使用在Mac OS X和iOS视网膜屏幕的全像素密度。该标志当前在Windows和Linux上不起作用，而在Android上始终有效。

trans-unit.source: The love.conf function takes one argument: a table filled with all the default values which you can overwrite to your liking. If you want to change the default window size, for instance, do:
trans-unit.target: 该 love.conf 函数有一个参数：充满了所有可以覆盖到您喜欢的默认值的表。例如，如果要更改默认窗口大小，请执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: The t.window table was named t.screen in versions prior to 0.9.0. The t.screen table doesn't exist in love.conf in 0.9.0, and the t.window table doesn't exist in love.conf in 0.8.0. This means love.conf will fail to execute (therefore it will fall back to default values) if care is not taken to use the correct table for the LÖVE version being used.
trans-unit.target: 在0.9.0之前的版本中， t.window 表被命名为 t.screen 。该 t.screen 表中不存在love.conf在0.9.0和 t.window 表不love.conf在0.8.0存在。这意味着，如果不注意为所使用的LÖVE版本使用正确的表，则love.conf将无法执行（因此将恢复为默认值）。

trans-unit.source: The varying keyword can be used to set a value in the vertex shader and have it interpolated in between vertices and passed down to the pixel shader.
trans-unit.target: 的 varying 关键字可以被用来设置在顶点着色器的值，并将它在顶点之间插补和向下传递到像素着色器。

trans-unit.source: The Shape's position is relative to the position of the Body it has been attached to.
trans-unit.target: 的形状的位置是相对于所述的位置身体它已被附接到。

trans-unit.source: The Variant type is not a real lua type, but instead indicates what lua values LÖVE can store internally. It is used in love.thread and love.event. Indeed, as it is a "virtual" type, it has no specific representation in lua, and no methods.
trans-unit.target: 该变型是不是一个真正的LUA类型，而是指明了LUA值爱可以在内部存储。它用于love.thread和love.event中。实际上，由于它是“虚拟”类型，因此它在lua中没有特定表示，也没有方法。

trans-unit.source: The value type is used to indicate, that all of Lua's types can be used in a certain place (e.g.: as arguments).
trans-unit.target: 的值类型用于指示，即所有lua的类型都可以在一个地方被使用（例如：作为参数）。

The BC4 and BC5 formats are supported on systems with DirectX 10 / OpenGL 3-capable desktop hardware and drivers. The BC6H and BC7 formats are only supported on desktop systems with DirectX 11 / OpenGL 4-capable hardware and very recent drivers. Mac OS X does not support BC6H or BC7 at all currently.
trans-unit.target: BC4和BC5格式在具有DirectX 10/OpenGL 3功能的桌面硬件和驱动程序的系统上得到支持。BC6H和BC7格式仅在使用DirectX 11/OpenGL 4功能硬件和最新驱动程序的桌面系统上支持。Mac OS X目前完全不支持BC6H或BC7。

trans-unit.source: The BC4 and BC5 formats are supported on systems with DirectX 10 / OpenGL 3-capable desktop hardware and drivers. The BC6H and BC7 formats are only supported on desktop systems with DirectX 11 / OpenGL 4-capable hardware and very recent drivers. macOS does not support BC6H or BC7 at all currently.
trans-unit.target: BC4和BC5格式在具有DirectX 10/OpenGL 3功能的桌面硬件和驱动程序的系统上得到支持。BC6H和BC7格式仅在使用DirectX 11/OpenGL 4能力硬件和最新驱动程序的桌面系统上支持。MacOS目前完全不支持BC6H或BC7。

trans-unit.source: The BC4 format (also known as 3Dc+ or ATI1.) Stores just the red channel, at 4 bits per pixel.
trans-unit.target: BC4格式(也称为3Dc+或ATI1。)只存储红色通道,每像素4位。

trans-unit.source: The BC5 format (also known as 3Dc or ATI2.) Stores red and green channels at 8 bits per pixel.
trans-unit.target: BC5格式(也称为3Dc或ATI2.)以每像素8位存储红绿通道。

trans-unit.source: The BC6H format. Stores half-precision floating-point RGB data in the range of [0, 65504] at 8 bits per pixel. Suitable for HDR images on desktop systems.
trans-unit.target: BC6H格式。在[0，65504]范围内以每像素8位存储半精度浮点RGB数据。适用于台式机系统上的HDR图像。

trans-unit.source: The BC6H format. Stores half-precision floating-point RGB data in the range of [0, 65504] at 8 bits per pixel. Suitable for HDR images on desktop systems.
trans-unit.target: BC6H格式。在[0，65504]范围内以每像素8位存储半精度浮点RGB数据。适用于台式机系统上的HDR图像。

trans-unit.source: The BC7 format (also known as BPTC.) Stores RGB or RGBA data at 8 bits per pixel.
trans-unit.target: BC7格式(也称为BPTC.)以每像素8位存储RGB或RGBA数据。

The Canvas has mipmaps, and all mipmap levels will automatically be recomputed when switching away from the Canvas with love.graphics.setCanvas.
trans-unit.target: Canvas具有mipmap，当使用love.graphics.setCanvas离开Canvas时，将自动重新计算所有mipmap级别。

trans-unit.source: The Canvas has mipmaps. love.graphics.setCanvas can be used to render to a specific mipmap level, or Canvas:generateMipmaps can (re-)compute all mipmap levels based on the base level.
trans-unit.target: 画布具有mipmap。love.graphics.setCanvas可以用于渲染到特定的mipmap级别，或者Canvas：generateMipmaps可以基于基础级别（重新）计算所有mipmap级别。

trans-unit.source: The Canvas has no mipmaps.
The Canvas must be created with mipmaps set to a MipmapMode other than "none" for this function to work. It should only be called while the Canvas is not the active render target.
trans-unit.target: 必须使用将mipmaps设置为“ none”以外的MipmapMode来创建Canvas ，此功能才能起作用。仅当Canvas不是活动的渲染目标时才应调用它。

trans-unit.source: The D key
The DPI scale factor of the Font.
The DPI scale factor of the Texture.
The DPI scale factor of the video.

The DPI scale factor represents relative pixel density. A DPI scale factor of 2 means the font's glyphs have twice the pixel density in each dimension (4 times as many pixels in the same area) compared to a font with a DPI scale factor of 1.
trans-unit.target: DPI比例因子代表相对像素密度。DPI比例系数为2意味着字体的字形在每个维度上的像素密度是DPI比例系数为1的字体的两倍(同一区域内像素数量的4倍)。

trans-unit.source: The DPI scale factor represents relative pixel density. A DPI scale factor of 2 means the texture has twice the pixel density in each dimension (4 times as many pixels in the same area) compared to a texture with a DPI scale factor of 1.
trans-unit.target: DPI比例因子代表相对像素密度。DPI比例系数为2意味着纹理在每个维度上的像素密度是DPI比例系数为1的纹理的两倍(同一区域内像素数量的4倍)。

trans-unit.source: The DPI scale factor represents relative pixel density. The pixel density inside the window might be greater (or smaller) than the "size" of the window. For example on a retina screen in Mac OS X with the highdpiwindow flag enabled, the window may take up the same physical size as an 800x600 window, but the area inside the window uses 1600x1200 pixels. love.graphics.getDPIScale() would return 2 in that case.
trans-unit.target: DPI比例因子表示相对像素密度。窗口内的像素密度可能大于（或小于）窗口的“大小”。例如，在启用了 highdpi 窗口标志的Mac OS X的视网膜屏幕上，该窗口可能会占用与800x600窗口相同的物理尺寸，但是该窗口内部的区域使用1600x1200像素。在这种情况下， love.graphics.getDPIScale() 将返回 2 。

trans-unit.source: The DPI scale to use when drawing the array image and calling getWidth/getHeight.
trans-unit.target: 绘制数组图像并调用getWidth / getHeight时要使用的DPI比例。

trans-unit.source: The DXT1 format. RGB data at 4 bits per pixel (compared to 32 bits for ImageData and regular Images.) Suitable for fully opaque images on desktop systems.
trans-unit.target: DXT1格式。RGB数据每像素4位（相比之下，ImageData和常规图像为32位。）适用于台式机系统上完全不透明的图像。

trans-unit.source: The DXT3 format. RGBA data at 8 bits per pixel. Smooth variations in opacity do not mix well with this format.
trans-unit.target: DXT3格式。每像素8位的RGBA数据。不透明度的平滑变化与这种格式不能很好地混合。

trans-unit.source: The DXT5 format. RGBA data at 8 bits per pixel. Recommended for images with varying opacity on desktop systems.
trans-unit.target: DXT5格式。每像素8位的RGBA数据。推荐用于桌面系统中不透明度不同的图像。

The HDR / floating point formats are most useful when combined with pixel shaders. Effects such as tonemapped HDR with bloom can be accomplished, or the canvas can be used to store arbitrary non-color data such as positions which can then be used in a custom shader.
trans-unit.target: 当与像素着色器结合时,HDR/浮点格式是最有用的。可以实现诸如带有绽放的色调映射HDR等效果,或者画布可以用来存储任意的非彩色数据,如位置,然后可以在自定义着色器中使用。

trans-unit.source: The HDR format is most useful when combined with pixel shaders. Effects such as tonemapped HDR with bloom can be accomplished, or the canvas can be used to store arbitrary non-color data such as positions which are then interpreted and used in a shader, as long as you draw the right things to the canvas.
trans-unit.target: HDR格式与像素着色器结合时最有用。可以实现诸如带有绽放的色调映射HDR等效果,也可以使用画布来存储任意的非彩色数据,如位置,然后在着色器中进行解释和使用,只要你在画布上绘制正确的东西。

The RGB values of what's drawn are not multiplied by the alpha values of those colors during blending. For most blend modes to work correctly with this alpha mode, the colors of a drawn object need to have had their RGB values multiplied by their alpha values at some point previously ("premultiplied alpha").
trans-unit.target: 在混合过程中，绘制的RGB值不会与这些颜色的alpha值相乘。为了使大多数混合模式能够正确地与此alpha模式一起使用，绘制对象的颜色必须事先将其RGB值乘以其alpha值（“预乘alpha”）。

trans-unit.source: The RGB values of what's drawn are multiplied by the alpha values of those colors during blending. This is the default alpha mode.
trans-unit.target: 在混合过程中,所画内容的RGB值与这些颜色的alpha值相乘。这是默认的alpha模式。

trans-unit.source: The RGBA variant of the ETC2 format where pixels are either fully transparent or fully opaque. RGBA data at 4 bits per pixel.
trans-unit.target: ETC2格式的RGBA变体,其中的像素要么完全透明,要么完全不透明。每像素4位的RGBA数据。

trans-unit.source: The arc is drawn counter clockwise if the starting angle is numerically bigger than the final angle. The arc is drawn clockwise if the final angle is numerically bigger than the starting angle.
trans-unit.target: 如果起始角在数值上大于最终角,则逆时针方向画弧。如果最终角在数值上大于起始角,则顺时针画弧。

trans-unit.source: The arc is drawn like a slice of pie, with the arc circle connected to the center at its end-points.
trans-unit.target: 弧线的画法就像一块饼,弧圈与中心的端点相连。

trans-unit.source: The arguments are in the same order as the vertex attributes in the Mesh's vertex format. A standard Mesh that wasn't created with a custom vertex format will use two position numbers, two texture coordinate numbers, and four color components per vertex: x, y, u, v, r, g, b, a.
trans-unit.target: 参数的顺序与Mesh 顶点格式中的顶点属性相同。未使用自定义顶点格式创建的标准网格将使用两个位置编号，两个纹理坐标编号以及每个顶点四个颜色分量：x，y，u，v，r，g，b，a。

trans-unit.source: The childIndex parameter is used to specify which child of a parent shape, such as a ChainShape, will be ray casted. For ChainShapes, the index of 1 is the first edge on the chain. Ray casting a parent shape will only test the child specified so if you want to test every shape of the parent, you must loop through all of its children.
trans-unit.target: childIndex参数用于指定父形(如ChainShape)的哪个子形将被射线投射。对于ChainShapes,索引为1的是链上的第一条边。射线投射父形时,只测试指定的子形,所以如果要测试父形的每个形状,必须循环测试它的所有子形。

trans-unit.target: 顶点，精灵，或文本字符的颜色，如果一个网，SpriteBatch，或文本与每个顶点的颜色绘制对象，或在恋爱0.9.2及以上的全球色彩镶有love.graphics.setColor。它没有应用伽马校正。

trans-unit.target: 绘制Text对象时，由love.graphics.setColor设置的颜色将与文本的颜色组合（相乘）。

trans-unit.source: The colors of what's drawn completely replace what was on the screen, with no additional blending. The BlendAlphaMode specified in love.graphics.setBlendMode still affects what happens.
trans-unit.target: 所绘制的颜色完全替代了屏幕上的颜色，而无需进行其他混合。在love.graphics.setBlendMode中指定的BlendAlphaMode仍然会影响发生的情况。

trans-unit.source: The colors passed into love.graphics.setColor, love.graphics.clear, and Shader:sendColor will automatically be converted from sRGB to linear RGB.
trans-unit.target: 传递到love.graphics.setColor，love.graphics.clear和Shader：sendColor的颜色将自动从sRGB 转换为线性RGB。

trans-unit.source: The colors set in SpriteBatches, text with per-character colors, ParticleSystems, points with per-point colors, standard Meshes, and custom Meshes which use the "VertexColor" attribute name will automatically be converted from sRGB to linear RGB when those objects are drawn.
trans-unit.target: 在设置颜色SpriteBatches，与每个字符的颜色的文本，粒子系统，点与每点的颜色，标准网格，和自定义网格其中使用“顶点颜色”属性名称将自动从sRGB的转换为线性RGB当这些对象被绘制。

trans-unit.source: The default method is efficient, but a body moving very quickly may sometimes jump over another body without producing a collision. A body that is set as a bullet will use CCD. This is less efficient, but is guaranteed not to jump when moving quickly.
trans-unit.target: 默认的方法很有效,但一个移动速度非常快的机体有时可能会跳过另一个机体而不产生碰撞。设置为子弹的机体会使用CCD。这种方式效率较低,但可以保证在快速移动时不会跳动。

trans-unit.source: The default paths string is "?.lua;?/init.lua", which makes require("cool") try to load cool.lua and then try cool/init.lua if cool.lua doesn't exist.
